Description: Customer legal full name like first, middle, last.
Customer birth date like Official Birth Date.
Declared gender identity of the customer.
The Address field captures the residential or correspondence location details of a customer.
Primary Phone number like Customer registered mobile or landline number.
Government issued identification number like Aadhar, SSN, Passport.
Profession or employment type of the customer.
Age of the customer based on the DOB information.
